short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows an AI generated summary for the Pivotal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pivotal Copilot is a powerful Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you interact with your CRM data.

Leveraging the advanced capabilities of the ChatGPT model, Pivotal Copilot intelligently captures and summarizes the information displayed on the user's screen, making it easier than ever to gain valuable insights and make informed decisions. With its seamless integration into your existing CRM workflow, Pivotal Copilot is the perfect companion for professionals seeking to enhance their productivity and make the most of their CRM data. Experience the future of CRM navigation with Pivotal Copilot's intuitive and efficient approach to data management.
